articles.author: Patrick Svitek
articles.title: Trump offers ‘assurance’ U.S. won’t send ground troops to Ukraine - The Washington Post
articles.description: In a TV interview, the president suggested European nations would have troops on the ground in Ukraine, while the United States would support them in other ways.
articles.content:
President Donald Trump said Tuesday that the United States will help defend Ukraine after its war with Russia but that there will not be U.S. troops on the ground.
You have my assurance, Trump said … [+136 chars]
